Uses of Class
i_couponSystemException.couponSystemException

  • Packages that use couponSystemException 
    Package Description
    d_coupon.sys.core.connection
    The ConnectionPool Package consist of Singleton Class ,every method in the Coupon system application should get a connection from the pool, and return it when done.
    e_coupon.sys.core.dao
    DAO interface classes The DAO Package consist of interface Classes describing C.R.U.D (Create,Read,Update,Delete) actions,for Company ,Customer and Coupon.
    f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db
    DAODB - Implements the DAO package interface in the DB using JDBC connection and SQL query.
    g_coupon.sys.core.facade
    FACADE - package implements business logic.
    h_coupon.sys.singleton
    The Singleton package consist of the make of the core Java Application into one Java file
    i_couponSystemException
    The Exception package consist of all the different Exception type(DAO exception Coupon System Exception etc.).
    k_tests
    Test package consist of testing for all layers of the Java Core application:Beans, DAODB ,Facade , singleton,Daily Job etc..

    • Uses of couponSystemException in d_coupon.sys.core.connection

      Methods in d_coupon.sys.core.connection that throw couponSystemException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConnectionPool.closeAllConnections()
      Closes all connection , and shutdown the application
      java.sql.Connection ConnectionPool.getConnection()
      getConnection is a synchronized method allows only one thread to access the Connection pool at a given point of time.
      static ConnectionPool ConnectionPool.getInstance()
      Get a ConnectionPool Singleton

    • Uses of couponSystemException in g_coupon.sys.core.facade

      Methods in g_coupon.sys.core.facade that throw couponSystemException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AdminFacade.createCompany(Company company)
      createCompany method first check if a Company doesn't exist by name, and then create a new Company according to the Java Bean created object.
      void CompanyFacade.createCoupon(Company company, Coupon coupon)
      createCoupon method first check if this Coupon doesn't exist in the DB, and this Company exist, then Create a new Coupon and refer it to the Company in the map table COMAPNY_COUPON.
      void AdminFacade.createCustomer(Customer customer)
      createCustomer method first check if a Customer doesn't exist by name, and then create a new Customer according to the Java Bean created object.
      java.util.Collection<Company> AdminFacade.getAllCompanies()
      getAllCompanies method pull all the Companies from the DB , if no company exist in DB return null.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getAllCoupons()
      getAllCoupons method returns all Coupons from the DB ,if No Coupons found retuen null.
      java.util.Collection<Customer> AdminFacade.getAllCustomers()
      getAllCustomers method pull all the Customers from the DB , if no Customer exist in DB return null.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerFacade.getAllPurchasedCoupons(Customer customer)
      getAllPurchasedCoupons method return all Purchased Coupons by this Customer.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerFacade.getAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice(Customer customer, double price)
      getAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice method return all Purchased Coupons by price per Customer.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CustomerFacade.getAllPurchasedCouponsByType(Customer customer, coupontype couponType)
      getAllPurchasedCouponsByType method return all Purchased Coupons by Type (ENUM couponType) per Customer.
      Company CompanyFacade.getCompany(long company_id)
      getCompany method check if a Company exist by Id it's returning the Company from the DB
      Company AdminFacade.getCompany(long company_id)
      getCompany method first check if a Company exist by Id in the DB, and then pull it from the DB.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCompanyCouponByEndDate(Company company, java.sql.Date EndDate)
      getCompanyCouponByEndDate method returns all Coupons by End Date per Company , if no Coupons found return null.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCompanyCouponByPrice(Company company, double price)
      getCompanyCouponByPrice method returns all Coupons by price per Company , if no Coupons found return null.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> CompanyFacade.getCompanyCouponByType(Company company, coupontype couponType)
      getCompanyCouponByType method returns all Coupons by Type per Company , if no Coupons found return null.
      Coupon CompanyFacade.getCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      getCoupon method check if a Coupon exist by Id it's returning the Coupon from the DB
      Customer AdminFacade.getCustomer(long customer_id)
      getCustomer method first check if a Company exist by Id in the DB, and then pull it from the DB.
      void CustomerFacade.purchaseCoupon(Customer customer, Coupon coupon)
      purchaseCoupon method check if Coupon exist in DB by Name, and the Customer didn't Purchased it, and the Coupon is not expired,then the Coupon is purchased.
      void AdminFacade.removeCompany(Company company)
      removeCompany first check if a Company exist by Id in the DB, and if exist remove the map Company reference from the company_coupon table , and then remove the Company.
      void CompanyFacade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      removeCoupon method check if a Coupon exist in the DB, then if remove it from the reference table CUSTOMER_COUPON , COMPANY_COUPON and then remove it from the COUPON table.
      void AdminFacade.removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      removeCustomer first check if a Customer exist by Id in the DB, and if exist remove the map Customer reference from the customer_coupon table , and then remove the Customer.
      void AdminFacade.updateCompany(Company company)
      updateCompany method first check if a Company doesn't exist by name, and then update Company in the DB according to the sent Company parameter.
      void CompanyFacade.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      updateCoupon method check if a Coupon exist ID in the DB, then if update all it's fields in the DB except for Id.
      void AdminFacade.updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      updateCustomer method first check if a Customer doesn't exist by name, and then update Customer in the DB according to the sent Customer parameter.
